"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { Button } from "./ui/button" import { Input } from "./ui/input" import { Search, MoreHorizontal, MessageCircle, Microscope, Building2, Stethoscope, User, Smile, Brain, ChevronRight, ArrowLeft, LifeBuoy, DoorOpen, Heart, Activity, Plus, Zap, Calendar, Clock, DollarSign, } from "lucide-react" export default function HomePage() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0) const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("") const [imageLoaded, setImageLoaded] = useState(false) const [showSettings, setShowSettings] = useState(false) const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ fullName: "", abhaId: "", age: "", }) const [appointmentData, setAppointmentData] = useState(null) const slides = [ { src: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=800&text=Advanced+Medical+Equipment", alt: "Advanced Respiratory Monitoring System - CPAP/Ventilator Display", }, { src: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=800&text=Apollo+Hospitals", alt: "Apollo Specialty Hospitals - Modern Healthcare Facility", }, { src: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=800&text=MRI+Scanner", alt: "Modern MRI/CT Scanner - Philips Medical Imaging Equipment", }, { src: "/placeholder.svg?height=200&width=800&text=Medical+Center", alt: "Apollo Hospitals - Multi-Specialty Medical Center", }, ] useEffect(() => { // Scroll to top when component mounts window.scrollTo(0, 0) const savedData = localStorage.getItem("signInFormData") if (savedData) { const parsedData = JSON.parse(savedData) // Calculate age from date of birth let calculatedAge = "" if (parsedData.dateOfBirth) { const birthDate = new Date(parsedData.dateOfBirth) const today = new Date() let age = today.getFullYear() - birthDate.getFullYear() const monthDiff = today.getMonth() - birthDate.getMonth() if (monthDiff < 0 || (monthDiff === 0 && today.getDate() < birthDate.getDate())) { age-- } calculatedAge = age.toString() } setUserData({ fullName: parsedData.fullName || "Not provided", abhaId: parsedData.abhaId || "Not provided", age: calculatedAge || "Not provided", }) } // Load appointment data const savedAppointment = localStorage.getItem("appointmentData") if (savedAppointment) { setAppointmentData(JSON.parse(savedAppointment)) } }, []) // Auto-play functionality useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setImageLoaded(false) setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % slides.length) }, 3000) return () => clearInterval(interval) }, [slides.length]) const services = [ { icon: () => , label: "Laboratory and scans", color: "text-teal-600", bgColor: "bg-gradient-to-br from-teal-50 to-teal-100", hoverColor: "hover:from-teal-100 hover:to-teal-200", path: "", }, { icon: () => , label: "Hospital", color: "text-blue-600", bgColor: "bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-blue-100", hoverColor: "hover:from-blue-100 hover:to-blue-200", path: "/hospital", }, { icon: () => , label: "General Physician", color: "text-green-600", bgColor: "bg-gradient-to-br from-green-50 to-green-100", hoverColor: "hover:from-green-100 hover:to-green-200", path: "/specialty/general-physician", }, { icon: () => , label: "Skincare and Hair", color: "text-purple-600", bgColor: "bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-50 to-purple-100", hoverColor: "hover:from-purple-100 hover:to-purple-200", path: "/specialty/skincare", }, { icon: () => ( ), label: "Dental Care", color: "text-indigo-600", bgColor: "bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-50 to-indigo-100", hoverColor: "hover:from-indigo-100 hover:to-indigo-200", path: "/specialty/dental-care", }, { icon: () => , label: "Mental Health", color: "text-pink-600", bgColor: "bg-gradient-to-br from-pink-50 to-pink-100", hoverColor: "hover:from-pink-100 hover:to-pink-200", path: "/specialty/mental-health", }, { icon: () => , label: "Child Specialist", color: "text-orange-600", bgColor: "bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-50 to-orange-100", hoverColor: "hover:from-orange-100 hover:to-orange-200", path: "/specialty/child-specialist", }, { icon: () => (
20+
), label: "More", color: "text-gray-600", bgColor: "bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-50 to-gray-100", hoverColor: "hover:from-gray-100 hover:to-gray-200", path: "", }, ] const familyMembers = [ { name: "MOM", color: "bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 to-green-500" }, { name: "DAUGHTER", color: "bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-400 to-purple-500" }, { name: "FATHER", color: "bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-400 to-yellow-500" }, ] const nextSlide = () => { setImageLoaded(false) setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % slides.length) } const prevSlide = () => { setImageLoaded(false) setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev - 1 + slides.length) % slides.length) } const handleSettingsClick = () => { setShowSettings(true) } const handleCloseSettings = () => { setShowSettings(false) } const handleServiceClick = (path) => { if (path) { navigate(path) } } const handleClearAppointment = () => { localStorage.removeItem("appointmentData") setAppointmentData(null) } return (
